replies.bodyText:
Hi @MarianMacik , configMap contains the key-value configuration pairs and countDownLatchMap maps the key to a CountDownLatch. countDownLatchMap.computeIfPresent(...) returns a CountDownLatch and atm the config values have to be fetched from the configMap after the latch is decremented.
Let me know if we can move forward with the current implementation!
